sub_fields.label: Options
sub_fields.name: options
sub_fields.instructions: One option per line as: value=Label eg: 1=Option 1

fields.label: Action Url
fields.name: action_url
fields.instructions: Custom url to submit the form. Leave empty if you are not sure, default is "./"

fields.label: Captcha
fields.name: captcha
fields.instructions: Enable number captcha ( x + y ?) to prevent spam.

fields.label: Success Title
fields.name: success_title
fields.instructions:
Title that will be displayed on the modal window after successful form submission. 
Use {field_name} to reference a form field.

fields.label: Success Message
fields.name: success_message
fields.instructions: Message that will be shown to the user after successful submit. Use {field_name} to reference a form field.

fields.label: Send Email
fields.name: send_email
fields.instructions: Receive email submissions from this form.

fields.label: Subject
fields.name: subject
fields.instructions: Email subject when receiving submissions. Use {field_name} to reference a form field.

fields.label: Admin Email
fields.name: admin_email
fields.instructions: Email address to receive submissions to. if empty, emails from site settings will be used. You can type multiple email addresses separated by comma.

fields.label: Create Post
fields.name: create_post
fields.instructions: Create a post from the form submition. Note that form field names needs to match post type fields.

fields.label: New Post Title
fields.name: new_post_title
fields.instructions: Use {field_name} to reference a form field.

fields.label: Duplicate Message
fields.name: duplicate_message
fields.instructions: You can use form fields like: {my_field}
